alert.note: Alert for Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 12:25AM CST until March 06 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR CENTRAL VERMILION COUNTY... At 1225 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Rossville, or 8 miles southwest of Talbot, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Danville, Westville, Tilton, Catlin, Oakwood, Fairmount, Fithian, Belgium, Muncie, Bismarck, Henning, Vermilion County Airport, Alvin and Kickapoo State Park. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 201 and 220. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
